thread.title: Disgusting vandal caught on camera as he 'wipes his own poo all over roof of white Porsche'
thread.title_full: Disgusting vandal caught on camera as he 'wipes his own poo all over roof of white Porsche'

author: Kara O'Neill
title: Disgusting vandal caught on camera as he 'wipes his own poo all over roof of white Porsche'
text:
News Disgusting vandal caught on camera as he 'wipes his own poo all over roof of white Porsche' The incident is believed to have occurred in the early hours of the morning and was captured by CCTV cameras Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Vandal smears poo on Porsche Share this video Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Disgusting video footage has captured the moment a vile vandal was allegedly caught smearing poo on the roof of a sports car. 
The CCTV footage shows a figure in a coat with the hood up using a plastic bag to wipe the apparent faeces on the Porsche Boxster convertible. 
A friend of the car’s owner posted the black-and-white video on the Facebook page Spotted: Coventry City , appealing for help to trace the culprit. 
The disgusted social media user said his friend’s car was targeted between 5.50am and 6.50am on Friday February 10 but it is not yet known whereabouts in Coventry it happened, reports the Coventry Telegraph. The owner of the CCTV footage claims the man smeared his own poo on the Porsche (Photo: Facebook | Spotted: Coventry City) 
The Facebook post read: “Do you recognise this horrible individual who thought it might be fun to smear his own poo on the roof of my friend’s car parked on my drive? 
“I would be grateful for any information. Thank you.” 
This is the second time outraged residents have complained about human waste causing a stink in the city. It's believed the attack happened in the early hours of the morning (Photo: Facebook | Spotted: Coventry City) Read More 
On February 7, Willenhall residents were left outraged after human waste was found in Salcombe Close - a cul-de-sac in the heart of the Coventry suburb. 
More muck was found by residents over the next few days. 
Concern for local children stumbling across the disgusting act has been raised on the Pride of Willenhall Facebook page. Like us on Facebook
